data.name: pla_toon - Supporter Edition
data.detailed_description:
pla_toon Supporter Edition:
This version allows you to further customize your characters appearance by choosing from hats such as hockey masks, spartan and football helmets, and more.
I made this version to thank the people who supported me thought the process of making this game before it's finished.

What you get:
1. A key to the full game when it's finished being built at no extra cost.
2. Hats: (I keep adding to this list as the game develops).
- Baseball cap that says supporter on it.
- Spartan helmet.
- Football helmet.
- Hockey mask.
- Cowboy hat.
- Aviator hat with goggles.
- Top hat + Monocle
3. A menu (on in-game escape menu) to test early features (such as spawning a biplane to test flying it etc) before anybody else and give your feedback on them.
4. Higher (10x) suggestion and vote (on what to add next to the game) priority.
5. Help the game develop faster.
6. A reduced early adopter price.

Thank you to all who have already supported me in making this project a reality!
Braden (The Dev)

data.short_description: pla_toon Supporter Edition: This version allows you to further customize your characters appearance by choosing from hats such as hockey masks, spartan and football helmets, test early features, and more.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7 64-bit
  • Processor: Quad-core Intel or AMD processor, 2.5 GHz or faster.
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM. GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce 470 GTX or AMD Radeon 6870 HD series card or higher.
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: These "requirements" are from Unreal Engine 4's website, however I have tested the game on machines with quite a bit less power and it has worked.

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Mac OS X 10.9.2 or later.
  • Processor: Quad-core Intel or AMD processor, 2.5 GHz or faster.
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce 470 GTX or AMD Radeon 6870 HD series card or higher.
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: These "requirements" are from Unreal Engine 4's website, however I have tested the game on machines with quite a bit less power and it has worked.
